scripts.dev:with-sim: concurrently "NODE_PORT=4000 node server.js" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/style.css -o ./public/style.css --watch" "npm run dev:sim"
scripts.vercel-build: mkdir -p public && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/style.css -o ./public/style.css && mkdir -p learning/modules && touch learning/modules/index.json
scripts.list-modules: node -e "console.table(require('./learning/modules/index.json').modules.map(m => ({moduleId: m.moduleId, name: m.moduleName, questions: m.questionCount, flashcards: m.flashcardCount})))"
